extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  (12.0 units in POLS at the 200-level or above) and (a GPA of 2.0 on all units in POLS) or permission of the department.

basic.description: An examination of the role of law in politics, the differences between legal and political reasoning, the law and politics of constitution-making, and the political character of criminal and civil law. Topics include the victim's rights movement, pornography and censorship, and the role of litigation in political life.
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: Law and the Governmental Process
